message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but I understand its worth from your perspective. Considering its unique features and benefits, I propose a transaction where you can purchase this product for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value to me and its perceived value to you. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to benefit. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
